data.text:
@Liza8284 Hi there, we are sorry to hear that your journey has been affected by a cancelation. Please send us your booking code via PM, so we can take a closer look. 
Best regards, Shawn
@LyJo3 Hi Lydia, from which airport do you depart? Kind regards, Christine

@WrldTraveler16 Hi there, you can take one or two items of hand luggage on board depending on the travel class booked. We can not be flexible with the weight and the size due to the space in the cabin. Kind regards, Funda
@PHiggenbottom Hi, please send us your booking code via a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@LyJo3 Hi Lydia, the maximum weight for your hand baggage is 8 kg. Depending on your booked class or frequent traveler status you can use the FastLane. Kind regards, Christine

@goth_hufflepuff Hi, da diese Menüs vorbestellt werden müssen, geht es nur bis zu 24 Stunden vor Abflug. Falls du noch zukünftige Flüge hast, kannst du uns gerne deine Buchungscode per PM schicken. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@GraceP0WER Hi Grace. please send us your enquiry via PM. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@t_h_i_s Hi there, please send us your booking code via DM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne
@srn_kate Hi Kate, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we are able to have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

@steph_whittaker @FlorenceAirport [2/2] individually and with great care to meet our costumers expectations, this may result in longer waiting times. We are sorry for that, but this is all we can do right now. Kind regards, Christine

@steph_whittaker @FlorenceAirport Hi Stephanie [1/2] we regret to read that you still have not received any answer via e-mail yet.We experience a higher amount of requests and our colleagues address every concern individually and with great care to meet our colleagues address every concern

@AXZUEW Hi Andreas, es tut mir leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Aus Erfahrungswerten empfehle ich dir zwischen 08:00 und 09:00 Uhr anzurufen, da die Wartezeit kürzer ist. Liebe Grüße, Denis
@UnaSrabovicRyan Hi, you can try reaching our colleagues in Vienna at +43 5 1766 1008. Best regards, Christiane

@VioTCZ Hi, unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane
@TAGWK [2/2] cause a longer waiting time. We thank you for your patience and we hope that we can soon get back to our normal responding time. We wish you a great day! Kind regards, Daphne

@TAGWK [1/2] Hi there, thank you very much for your feedback! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our colleagues are doing their utmost to answer all the inquiries and try to solve each passenger's case individually. Due to the high amount of requests at the moment, this might
@2bonline Hallo, sende uns bitte deine Daten inkl. Datum/Flugnummer/Name via PM und wir können uns das gerne ansehen. Liebe Grüße, Daphne
@drjackson_sg1 @flughafen_wien @la_Biennale Hi there, please send us the booking code and your request via DM. Kind regards, Funda
@JennMilan [2/2]  Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Funda

@JennMilan [1/2] Hi Jenn, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the

@yourfellowarab [1/2] 
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@yourfellowarab [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. 
Best regards, Shawn

data.text:
@uccelletta [2/2] Dennoch können wir dich nur nochmals bitten unsere Kolleg:innen telefonisch zu kontaktieren, da sie einen Einblick zu deinem Anliegen haben. Wir bedanken uns für deine Geduld und dein Verständnis. 
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@uccelletta [1/2] Hi, 
Es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation sind leider alle Kanäle überlastet und es kann zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen.
@justriqueta Hi Justine, I've already replied to your other posting. Best regards, Christiane
@JCelestus @berlinairport Hi, I just replied to you on Facebook. Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @onecent_ Hi Penny, we understand your frustration and we care about all our passengers and try our best to offer the best service we can. We are currently experiencing an airport staff shortage, which affects some ground handling services. Best regards, Denis
@JCelestus @berlinairport Hi John, I've just replied to your other posting. Best regards, Denis
@lalineavienna @flughafen_wien @la_Biennale Hi, ich habe dir soeben auf IG geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Sarah

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text:
@bre_grubbs Hi, 
we are sorry for not being able to assist you in time. For any refund request, we kindly ask you to use the following link https://t.co/okoMBxVSXz 
Many thanks for your patience and understanding.
Best regards, Shawn

@HangGiangNL Hi there, if you click on the link, please do it on desktop version and you can fill out the correct form. If you do it on mobile version, you will only see the chat roboter. Kind regards, Daphne

The art of reducing carbon emissions: Travel with #SAF to the #BiennaleArte2022 🎨✈️
Every ticket purchased with 100% #Sustainable Fuel from VIE to VCE now receives the climate-friendly journey to @flughafen_wien with the City Airport Train #CAT + free admission to @la_biennale! https://t.co/j9E1wiafeK

data.text: @bre_grubbs Hi, we are truly sorry that your flight got canceled. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Sarah

@KoutrouWedding Hi Tou, who recommended you 4 hours? On short-haul flights, we recommend being at the airport 2h before departure as this is the time when the check-in counter opens. Sorry fi there was a misunderstanding. Kind regards, Sarah
@HangGiangNL Hi Giang, so did your fill out our online form to get in touch with our Feedback Management department? Kind regards, Sarah
@ProfOnderco Hi Michael, please send us your booking code. Can your mum step stairs? Kind regards, Sarah
@AbdelRh95682649 [2/2] Our colleagues are currently receiving a large number of inquiries and they are unfortunately unable to keep to the average processing time. Kind regards, Derya

@AbdelRh95682649 [1/2]Hi Abdelrhman, we strongly distance ourselves from any form of racism. We are an internationally operating company and our staff is from all over the world we cherish and love this multicultural climate very much.

@rjgatesontheweb Hi Rob, we- the Social media Team- have no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. Hope you will be reunited with your baggage soon. Kind regards, Derya

@LennoxFlopdog [2/2] We want you to know that this is not typical for the type of service we strive to provide our customers, so thank you for sharing your honest feedback with us. In order to submit a claim please fill out the following contact form https://t.co/VqehU5Jerq regards, Derya
@LennoxFlopdog [1/2] Hi there, we are very sorry you had a poor experience on your previous wit us. We of course understand your anger and that you have cause for criticism regarding our service.
@JessyFanja [2/2]  We look forward to providing you with a smoother experience next time. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @JessyFanja [1/2] Hi Drya, thank you for reaching out. We are sincerely sorry for any inconvenience caused by the cancelation of your flight and you also couldn´t reach out to us via phone. To bring your feedback to notice please fill out the following contact form https://t.co/H47kr4v9Jy.

@a_____alex @lufthansa @AnnaPachinger Hi Alexander,  I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. If you haven´t done it yet please send an email to centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @noonesbhakt Hi, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as they can. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@HangGiangNL Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage hasn't been. Once your luggage has been located our colleagues will contact you. Unfortunately, there are currently European wide delays in luggage loading and tracing. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@alexj1976 Hi Alexander, please don't share your booking code publicly due to privacy reasons. Please write us a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine

@onecent_ Hi Penny, we regret to read that. Well, even though you are flying back to Vienna it's not possible to search for your bag by yourself. We can only ask you for your continued patience in this case. Kind regards, Christine
@LoveDestinexo Hi there, everything is fine with your booking. We replied to your PM already. Kind regards, Funda
@solly1710 @grntprttn @lufthansa @Lufthansa_DE Hi Soliman, we regret to read that. Were you able to rebook your flights meanwhile? Kind regards, Christine

@grntprttn Hi, it's been taken out of the winter schedule for the time being as well I am afraid. We are still operating our Manchester route or there is the option via Frankfurt or Germany with Lufthansa. Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text:
@onecent_ [1/2] Hi there, 
Thank you for getting in touch. However, we cannot provide you with any information on how long it usually takes to get your luggage to you, as every case varies from every other case.

@onecent_ [2/2] As soon as my colleagues have any updates about your case, they will get in touch with you. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Best regards, Shawn

data.text:
@evelienclaudien Hi Evelien, should your flight from Amsterdam be delayed please be assured that my colleagues at the service desk in Vienna will try everything to find a suitable alternative for you and to get you to your destination as fast as possible. 
Best regards, Denis

@onecent_ Hi Penny, unfortunately, we cannot tell you a specific time of response but it might be up to a couple of weeks. Our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you with news soon. Therefore we kindly ask you for a bit more patience. Best regards, Christiane

@entheogenic_eth Hi, unfortunately, all our channels are very busy currently. If there's anything we can assist you with please be specific and send us your booking reference and/or your ticket number in a DM. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@godelfin [1/2] Hi there, 
We are sorry that you had difficulty contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times.

@godelfin [2/2] Nevertheless, we can only ask you again to contact our Service Center by phone to carry out the payment.
Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @onecent_ Hi there, yes you can. You can fill out the form here: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne
@Ralphripshit Hi there, you can send us your E-Mail ID reference (OS-XXXXXXX) via DM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne

@Lovisa23584224 [2/2]difficulties at the moment & they are doing their best to reunite the bags with their owners. If you want to, you can go directly to the airport & contact the lost & found staff. Perhaps you can get your bags there directly if the bags have been found there already.

@Lovisa23584224 [1/2] Hi there, you will only have a PIR-number if you filed a report directly at the airport, but a reference number will do the same. As mentioned before, we do unfortunately not have any baggage system access. All airports and all colleagues are currently facing the same

@lovisa23584224 [2/2] If yes, you should have received a PIR-Number which will allow you to trace your baggage via the following link: https://t.co/370QsxkP3t
Best regards, Denis
@lovisa23584224 [1/2] Hi Lovisa, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. The Social Media team does not have access to the baggage system. Have you filed a claim at the airport?
@vanessaaszalos Hi Feia, I am sorry to hear about your flight cancellation due to a general strike in Italy. I hope that your future travels will be according to plan again. Best regards, Denis

@ralphripshit Hi Ralph, please rest assured my colleagues will contact you as soon as possible. Unfortunately, responses of Customer Relations are currently delayed due to the extraordinarily high volume of incoming inquiries. My apologies for the time waiting. Best regards,Denis

@moralesjj Hi, unfortunately, we've no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane

@JoshHead @BBC_Travel Hi Josh, I´m very sorry to hear that your baggage is still missing. Please accept my sincere apologies. Please send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @AlvaroRG83 Hi, we apologize for the disruption to your journey. You can submit a claim via our website: https://t.co/Ol8KOMXtt0 Kind regards, Lyndsay

@LyJo3 Hi Lydia, you can take one piece of hand luggage up to 8kg with the max. dimensions 55 x 40 x 23 cm. In addition to your carry-on baggage, you may take another personal item with the maximum dimensions of 40 x 30 x 10 cm in the cabin for example a handbag. Best regards, Sarah
